item.title: Network Programmability, which is preferred? SNMP or CLI or Yang
item.description: Network Programmability, which is preferred? SNMP or CLI or Yang Network programmability is directly linked to Software Defined Network (SDN). So, it is driven by real benefits like time and cost savings, reduction of humanÂ error, customization and innovation. The network programmability is currently understood as a set of tools and best practices to deploy, manage and troubleshoot network device, but it’s way beyond that. Network programmability is not new. From the screen scrapping, to bash and expect scripts.
